title: Old Gatorade Logo Font (Thirst Quencher)
content:
Hi there!

Looking to find out what font is used for the "Thirst Quencher" bit. Or at least something really close to it! I assume this is NOT a custom typeface, given how much it is used on the label, etc. I also assume this treatment has been skewed. Or maybe this is the italic form?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002122im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot%202014-03-26%2014_5960.53.48.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002122im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot%202014-03-26%2014_5782.53.57.png)

A shot of the "lemon ice" which appears to be in the same font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002122im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot%202014-03-26%2014_5334.57.39.png)

Thank you!
author: evanmacdonald

comments.content:
To me it is close to some [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002122/http:/myfonts.us/td-nS6MN6) Compressed: Impact, Compacta, Haettenschweiller, British Inserat...  
A former [discussion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150305002122/http:/typophile.com/node/105062#comment-561507) on a related topic.
